articles.description: Fans line the streets to see Sir Bobby Charlton's cortège pass from Old Trafford to Manchester Cathedral.
articles.title: Sir Bobby Charlton: Crowds gather for funeral procession

articles.description: Chelsea forward Cole Palmer, Aston Villa centre-back Ezri Konsa and Manchester City defender Rico Lewis have been called up to the England squad for the first time.
articles.title: Konsa, Palmer and Lewis called up to England squad

articles.description: Emma Raducanu pulls out of an exhibition match in December as she continues her rehabilitation from hand and foot operations.
articles.title: Raducanu pulls out of December exhibition match

articles.description: Mark Chapman and guests debate the weekend's football.
articles.title: Monday Night Club - 13/11/23

articles.description: Forty overs, one ball rather than two and more knockout matches - former England bowler Steven Finn maps out his plan to improve the World Cup.
articles.title: My plan to revitalise ODI World Cup - Finn column

articles.description: Former Manchester United manager Sir Alex Ferguson and others pay tribute at club legend Sir Bobby Charlton's funeral.
articles.title: 'A wonderful, humble man' - Ferguson on Charlton

articles.description: Liverpool's Trent Alexander-Arnold says he is continuing to learn his "hybrid" role by watching video clips of some of the game's best midfielders.
articles.title: Alexander-Arnold embracing 'hybrid' midfield role

articles.description: Live text commentary as the Bannsiders host Glentoran at the Coleraine Showgrounds in the Irish Premiership.
articles.title: Latest: Coleraine v Glentoran

articles.description: Former England internationals Jill Scott, Ellen White and Anita Asante are named as the 2023 inductees into the Women's Super League Hall of Fame.
articles.title: Scott, White and Asante enter WSL Hall of Fame

articles.description: Chelsea were fearless against Manchester City on Sunday but Cole Palmer's penalty to earn them a point was especially brave, says MOTD2 pundit Alan Shearer.
articles.title: 'Palmer not the only Chelsea player to prove a point'
